data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The basketball game was just suddenly interrupted for an urgent news broadcast. Hurry ____ and ____ listen. Let's ____ what's ____ on. I ____ if ____ has ____ to ____ with ____ progress ____ the ____ overseas. I wish that the conflict would end quickly.
data.partBlankContent: The basketball game was just suddenly interrupted for an urgent news broadcast. Hurry u_ and co__ listen. Let's he__ what's go___ on. I won___ if th__ has anyt____ to d_ with t__ progress o_ the w__ overseas. I wish that the conflict would end quickly.
data.fullContent: The basketball game was just suddenly interrupted for an urgent news broadcast. Hurry up and come listen. Let's hear what's going on. I wonder if this has anything to do with the progress of the war overseas. I wish that the conflict would end quickly.
data.answer: 篮球赛突然被紧急新闻播报打断了。快来听。我们来听听是怎么回事。我想知道这是否与海外战争的进展有关。我希望这场冲突能尽快结束。
